file_content.text: Mos Ila feels more secure already.
Your smuggling ring is broken. Here's everything I could salvage.
Excellent. I was hoping that was you I was hearing about.
The local authorities have been all in a dither about an "unprovoked massacre" of suspected Exchange members.
I hope this compensates you sufficiently for your time.
I will sleep better knowing our explosives are out of Exchange hands.
My lord. I'm sorry for whatever business brings you to this worthless wasteland.
I don't know what you're doing here, bounty hunter. Nobody on this dust heap worth killing.
You ever wonder what the Empire was thinking, trying to take this wasteland?
You interested in striking a blow against the Exchange? Sooner the Empire tightens the noose, the sooner most of us can ship home.
Gangsters are smuggling our explosives out of Mos Ila, selling them to the Republic. Need to show them it's a bad idea.
No one steals from the Empire and lives.
They must be taught a lesson.
Thank you all.
Thank you, my lord.
Thank you.
This a paying job?
Teaching the Exchange a lesson shouldn't take long for someone of your skills. We can buy a few hours.
Tell me what's happening.
The Exchange has been hiding their haul in back alleys until they consolidate for a big shipment.
Why recruit me?
Unfortunately, my duties require that I stay here.
We need our explosives back, and we need to find out who's running their operation.
If you'll help, I'll get you locations for all suspected stashes. But be careful; we've already lost good soldiers to the Exchange guards.
They won't be a problem.
Is that it? Clean out the stashes?
Anything else?
Is that all?
We also need to shut down whoever's coordinating this.
If any of their men attack, search them--they must have a base, a way to communicate....
Retrieving the explosives is important, but we must get to their leaders to stop this problem for good.
Not for me. [Refuse quest]
I'm sorry to hear that. If any of you change your mind, let me know....
I'm sorry to presume, my lord.
I'm sorry to impose.
What a wretched post....
